activities: The purpose of the RainKing database is to provide and maintain regularly refreshed sales intelligence on the companies profiled and the business contacts therein. The database contains contact and company information from a variety of sources, including primary research by RainKing researchers. Customers of the RainKing database may also make suggestions about changes or additions to the database; all such suggestions are vetted by the RainKing research team before incorporation into the product.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Data fields collected and processed for individuals include: name, job title and job function, business telephone number, and business email address
recoursemech: Any questions or concerns regarding the data privacy processes used by RainKing should be directed to the RainKing Privacy office at research@rainkingonline.com. RainKing will investigate and attempt to resolve issues and disputes according to the principles laid out in this policy. For disputes that cannot be resolved between RainKing and the complainant, RainKing will cooperate with JAMS pursuant to the JAMS International Mediation Rules, which are accessible at the JAMS website at www.jamsadr.com/rules-international-rules. RainKing will take steps to remedy any issues arising out of a failure to comply with Safe Harbor principles.
